Trigger.Name: BRD Keypresses (Numpad Key OGCDs)
Trigger.Description:
Keep disabled to prevent it from accidentally firing
Call with conditions enabled - need this so that the triggers here check their own conditions

Action.Description: 96+1 is Num0 96+10 is Num9 96+11 is Num* 96+12 is Num+

ConditionSingle.ExpressionL: min(${var:${var:targetID} Venomous Bite Duration},${var:${var:targetID} Windbite Duration})-${_systemtimems}
min(${var:${var:targetID} Venomous Bite Duration},${var:${var:targetID} Windbite Duration})-${_systemtimems}
min(${var:${var:targetID} Caustic Bite Duration},${var:${var:targetID} Stormbite Duration})-${_systemtimems}
min(${var:${var:targetID} Caustic Bite Duration},${var:${var:targetID} Stormbite Duration})-${_systemtimems}

Trigger.Name: BRD Actions
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^(?<type>2[12])\|(?<timestamp>[^|]*)\|(?<sourceId>[^|]*)\|(?<source>[^|]*)\|(?<id>[^|]*)\|(?<ability>Heavy Shot|Straight Shot|Venomous Bite|Quick Nock|Wide Volley|Windbite|Iron Jaws|Caustic Bite|Stormbite|Refulgent Arrow|Shadowbite|Burst Shot|Apex Arrow|Ladonsbite|Blast Arrow|Raging Strikes|Bloodletter|Mage's Ballad|the Warden's Paean|Barrage|Army's Paeon|Rain of Death|Battle Voice|the Wanderer's Minuet|Pitch Perfect|Empyreal Arrow|Sidewinder|Troubadour|Nature's Minne|Radiant Finale|Heartbreak Shot|Leg Graze|Second Wind|Foot Graze|Peloton|Head Graze|Arm's Length)\|(?<targetId>[^|]*)\|(?<target>[^|]*)\|(?<flags>[^|]*)\|(?<damage>[^|]*)\|(?:[^|]*\|){14}(?<targetCurrentHp>[^|]*)\|(?<targetMaxHp>[^|]*)\|(?<targetCurrentMp>[^|]*)\|(?<targetMaxMp>[^|]*)\|(?:[^|]*\|){2}(?<targetX>[^|]*)\|(?<targetY>[^|]*)\|(?<targetZ>[^|]*)\|(?<targetHeading>[^|]*)\|(?<currentHp>[^|]*)\|(?<maxHp>[^|]*)\|(?<currentMp>[^|]*)\|(?<maxMp>[^|]*)\|(?:[^|]*\|){2}(?<x>[^|]*)\|(?<y>[^|]*)\|(?<z>[^|]*)\|(?<heading>[^|]*)\|(?<sequence>[^|]*)\|(?<targetIndex>0)\|(?<targetCount>[^|]*)\|

Weaponskills: Heavy Shot|Straight Shot|Venomous Bite|Quick Nock|Wide Volley|Windbite|Iron Jaws|Caustic Bite|Stormbite|Refulgent Arrow|Shadowbite|Burst Shot|Apex Arrow|Ladonsbite|Blast Arrow
Abilities: Raging Strikes|Bloodletter|Mage's Ballad|the Warden's Paean|Barrage|Army's Paeon|Rain of Death|Battle Voice|the Wanderer's Minuet|Pitch Perfect|Empyreal Arrow|Sidewinder|Troubadour|Nature's Minne|Radiant Finale|Heartbreak Shot|Leg Graze|Second Wind|Foot Graze|Peloton|Head Graze|Arm's Length

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: ^(?:Heavy Shot|Straight Shot|Venomous Bite|Quick Nock|Wide Volley|Windbite|Iron Jaws|Caustic Bite|Stormbite|Refulgent Arrow|Shadowbite|Burst Shot|Apex Arrow|Ladonsbite|Blast Arrow)$

^(?:Raging Strikes|Bloodletter|Mage's Ballad|the Warden's Paean|Barrage|Army's Paeon|Rain of Death|Battle Voice|the Wanderer's Minuet|Pitch Perfect|Empyreal Arrow|Sidewinder|Troubadour|Nature's Minne|Radiant Finale|Heartbreak Shot|Leg Graze|Second Wind|Foot Graze|Peloton|Head Graze|Arm's Length)$

min(${var:Fleche Recast},${var:Contre Sixte Recast},${var:Embolden Recast},${var:Manafication Recast})-${_systemtimems}

Action.Description: 96+1 is Num0 96+10 is Num9 96+11 is Num* 96+12 is Num+

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: ^(?:Riposte|Zwerchhau|Redoublement|Enchanted Riposte|Enchanted Zwerchhau|Enchanted Redoublement|Jolt|Verthunder|Veraero|Verfire|Verstone|Jolt II|Verthunder III|Veraero III|Jolt III)$
^(?:Moulinet|Enchanted Moulinet|Enchanted Moulinet Deux|Enchanted Moulinet Trois|Scatter|Verthunder II|Veraero II|Impact)$

Action.Description: Removes second weave from actions with a short GCD

Trigger.Name: RDM Gauge
Trigger.Description:
^(?<type>31)\|(?<timestamp>[^|]*)\|(?<id>[^|]*)\|(?<data0>[^|]*)\|(?<data1>[^|]*)\|(?<data2>[^|]*)\|(?<data3>[^|]*)\|
plugin/CactbotEventSource/FFXIVProcessIntl.cs data0 is 4 offsets 00(offset2) 00(offset1) 00(offset0) 00(job number)
data1 is 4 offsets 00(offset6) 00(offset5) 00(offset4) 00(offset3)
Presumably pattern continues from here

Trigger.Name: DNC OGCDs (fired from other triggers, keep disabled)
Trigger.Description:
Keep disabled to prevent it from accidentally firing
Call with conditions enabled - need this so that the triggers here check their own conditions

Trigger.Name: Weaponskills
Trigger.Description: Expected behavior: - (Enchanted) Riposte > (Enchanted) Zwerchhau > (Enchanted) Redoublement > Reset - Combo only advances when an actual hit is registered. (Might have unexpected behavior due to invincibility on certain encounters. I don't understand bitmasks.) - Anything that breaks combo resets the combo. - Combo resets after 15 seconds unless a new matched action is detected, in which case it resets that timer.

Trigger.Name: Steps
Trigger.Description: Expected behavior: - (Enchanted) Riposte > (Enchanted) Zwerchhau > (Enchanted) Redoublement > Reset - Combo only advances when an actual hit is registered. (Might have unexpected behavior due to invincibility on certain encounters. I don't understand bitmasks.) - Anything that breaks combo resets the combo. - Combo resets after 15 seconds unless a new matched action is detected, in which case it resets that timer.

Trigger.Name: Finishes
Trigger.Description: Expected behavior: - (Enchanted) Riposte > (Enchanted) Zwerchhau > (Enchanted) Redoublement > Reset - Combo only advances when an actual hit is registered. (Might have unexpected behavior due to invincibility on certain encounters. I don't understand bitmasks.) - Anything that breaks combo resets the combo. - Combo resets after 15 seconds unless a new matched action is detected, in which case it resets that timer.

^(?:Vorpal Thrust|Lance Barrage|Fang and Claw|Wheeling Thrust|Sonic Thrust)$

Trigger.Name: SMN Abilities
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}(?<logType>ActionEffect 15|AOEActionEffect 16):(?<sourceID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<sourceName>[a-zA-Z']+? [a-zA-Z']+?):(?<actionID>[\dA-F]{2,8}):(?<actionName>Aethercharge|Deathflare|Dreadwyrm Trance|Summon Bahamut|Energy Drain|Energy Siphon|Enkindle Bahamut|Enkindle Phoenix|Fester|Painflare|Radiant Aegis|Rekindle|Searing Light|Summon Phoenix):

Trigger.Name: SMN GCD Actions
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{15}(?<logType>ActionEffect 15|AOEActionEffect 16):(?<sourceID>[\dA-F]{8}):(?<sourceName>[a-zA-Z']+? [a-zA-Z']+?):(?<actionID>[\dA-F]{2,8}):(?<actionName>(?:Topaz |Emerald )?(?:Ruin|Summon|Outburst|Tri-disaster|Rite|Catastrophe|Astral Impulse|Astral Flare|Fountain of Fire|Brand of Purgatory|Crimson Cyclone|Crimson Strike)(?: Ruby| Topaz| Emerald| Ifrit| Titan| Garuda|Bahamut|Phoenix)?(?: II| III| IV)?):(?<targetID>[\dA-F]{8}):
Trigger.Description: Expected behavior: - (Enchanted) Riposte > (Enchanted) Zwerchhau > (Enchanted) Redoublement > Reset - Combo only advances when an actual hit is registered. (Might have unexpected behavior due to invincibility on certain encounters. I don't understand bitmasks.) - Anything that breaks combo resets the combo. - Combo resets after 15 seconds unless a new matched action is detected, in which case it resets that timer.

Trigger.Description:
Spells: Fire in Red|Aero in Green|Water in Blue|Fire II in Red|Pom Motif|Wing Motif|Aero II in Green|Water II in Blue|Hammer Stamp|Hammer Motif|Blizzard in Cyan|Blizzard II in Cyan|Stone in Yellow|Thunder in Magenta|Stone II in Yellow|Thunder II in Magenta|Starry Sky Motif|Holy in White|Hammer Brush|Polishing Hammer|Comet in Black|Rainbow Drip|Claw Motif|Maw Motif|Star Prism|Sleep
Abilties: Tempera Coat|Smudge|Mog of the Ages|Pom Muse|Winged Muse|Striking Muse|Subtractive Palette|Starry Muse|Tempera Grassa|Clawed Muse|Fanged Muse|Retribution of the Madeen|Addle|Lucid Dreaming|Swiftcast|Surecast

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: ^(?:Fire in Red|Aero in Green|Water in Blue|Fire II in Red|Pom Motif|Wing Motif|Aero II in Green|Water II in Blue|Hammer Stamp|Hammer Motif|Blizzard in Cyan|Blizzard II in Cyan|Stone in Yellow|Thunder in Magenta|Stone II in Yellow|Thunder II in Magenta|Starry Sky Motif|Holy in White|Hammer Brush|Polishing Hammer|Comet in Black|Rainbow Drip|Claw Motif|Maw Motif|Star Prism|Sleep)$

^(?:Tempera Coat|Smudge|Mog of the Ages|Pom Muse|Winged Muse|Striking Muse|Subtractive Palette|Starry Muse|Tempera Grassa|Clawed Muse|Fanged Muse|Retribution of the Madeen|Addle|Lucid Dreaming|Swiftcast|Surecast)$

Action.Description: Mog of the Ages / Retribution of the Madeen (outside of burst)
Living Muse (attempt to hold Wings and Fangs for Starry Muse)
Mog of the Ages / Retribution of the Madeen (Starry Muse)
96+1 is Num0 96+10 is Num9 96+11 is Num* 96+12 is Num+
Mog of the Ages / Retribution of the Madeen (outside of burst)
Mog of the Ages / Retribution of the Madeen (Starry Muse)

ConditionSingle.ExpressionL: max(${var:Dualcast Duration},${var:Swiftcast Duration},${var:Acceleration Duration},${var:Grand Impact Ready Duration})-${_systemtimems}

Action.Description: 96+1 is Num0 96+10 is Num9 96+11 is Num* 96+12 is Num+

Trigger.Name: BLM GCD
Trigger.Description: Expected behavior: - (Enchanted) Riposte > (Enchanted) Zwerchhau > (Enchanted) Redoublement > Reset - Combo only advances when an actual hit is registered. (Might have unexpected behavior due to invincibility on certain encounters. I don't understand bitmasks.) - Anything that breaks combo resets the combo. - Combo resets after 15 seconds unless a new matched action is detected, in which case it resets that timer.

Action.Description: Removes second weave from actions with a short GCD
Removes second weave from actions with a short GCD
Removes second weave from actions with a short GCD

Action.LogMessageText: ${var:Astral Fire} ${var:Astral Fire Milliseconds} | ${var:Umbral Ice} ${var:Umbral Ice Milliseconds}

Action.Description: Subtractive Palette + Aetherhue / Aetherhue II (low duration)

Trigger.Name: BLM Keypresses (fired from other triggers, keep disabled)
Trigger.Description:
Keep disabled to prevent it from accidentally firing
Call with conditions enabled - need this so that the triggers here check their own conditions

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: ^(?:Fire in Red|Aero in Green|Water in Blue|Blizzard in Cyan|Stone in Yellow|Thunder in Magenta)$
^(?:Fire II in Red|Aero II in Green|Water II in Blue|Blizzard II in Cyan|Stone II in Yellow|Thunder II in Magenta)$

Action.Description: Removes second weave from actions with a short GCD

ConditionSingle.ExpressionR: ^(?:Hammer Stamp|Holy in White|Hammer Brush|Polishing Hammer|Comet in Black|Star Prism)$

^(?:Fire in Red|Aero in Green|Water in Blue|Fire II in Red|Pom Motif|Wing Motif|Aero II in Green|Water II in Blue|Hammer Motif|Blizzard in Cyan|Blizzard II in Cyan|Stone in Yellow|Thunder in Magenta|Stone II in Yellow|Thunder II in Magenta|Starry Sky Motif|Rainbow Drip|Claw Motif|Maw Motif|Sleep)$

Spells: Blizzard|Fire|Thunder|Blizzard II|Scathe|Fire II|Thunder II|Fire III|Blizzard III|Umbral Soul|Freeze|Thunder III|Flare|Blizzard IV|Fire IV|Thunder IV|Foul|Despair|Xenoglossy|High Fire II|High Blizzard II|Paradox|High Thunder|High Thunder II|Flare Star
Abilties: Transpose|Manaward|Manafont|Aetherial Manipulation|Ley Lines|Between the Lines|Triplecast|Amplifier|Retrace|Addle|Lucid Dreaming|Swiftcast|Surecast
